bug.author: nswamy
bug.summary: Support Double precision type in Scala
bug.description: Currently MXNet-Scala APIs support only float32, this would cause accuracy issues when customers port models between developed on Python to Scala. This needs to be fixed

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nswamy>@nswamy</denchmark-link> - but is this a bug or a feature request?
This is both a bug and feature request, since the accuracy will drop using Float32 on a model vs Float64
Let's combine the conversation in here so we can kill dupes in issues: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/10338>#10338</denchmark-link>
